channel.title: revolution on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in revolution on Dipankar's blog

item.title: government aka sarkar
item.description: Well, my name is Dipankar Sarkar. And Sarkar is hindi for goverment … so one my friends (specifically Varun Gulshan) would keep calling me that which to be honest is a fantastic nickname ;). Jokes apart, I guess i am a bit frustrated with how things work around me. As an individual who says “chop, chop” as he is in a perennial hurry, it kills me to see how things work.
